incident_updates.body: The issue with "Invalid recipient" errors due to a high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values has been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

Our engineers have deployed a fix to address the high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values, which previously caused a spike in "Invalid recipient" errors. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We’ll provide another update in 30 minutes or sooner if more information becomes available. Thank you for your patience as we resolved this issue.

Our engineers have identified the issue as a high volume of INBOUND_RECEIPT events with invalid remoteId values, which is causing a spike in "Invalid recipient" errors. incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in Spain for a Subset of Twilio Numbers

incident_updates.body: We experienced an SMS delivery issue for 2 hours between 08:50AM and 10:50AM Pacific Time on 11/06/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delivery failures to multiple networks in Spain for a subset of Twilio numbers. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Event Streams Subscriptions Issues

incident_updates.body: Twilio Event Streams subscriptions were degraded for 1 hour and 10 minutes between 05:38AM and 06:48AM Pacific Time on 11/06/2024. During this period of time, newly created subscriptions did not start to receive events until 06:48AM Pacific Time. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Event Streams. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
